discover.instruction: Read about travel experiences. Notice how we talk about life experiences.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай об опыте путешествий. Обрати внимание, как мы говорим о жизненном опыте.

content.text: I love traveling! I <highlight>have visited</highlight> 15 countries in my life. I <highlight>have been</highlight> to Japan twice. I <highlight>have never been</highlight> to Australia, but I want to go. My friend <highlight>has traveled</highlight> around the world. She <highlight>has seen</highlight> amazing places. <highlight>Have</highlight> you ever <highlight>tried</highlight> sushi? I <highlight>have eaten</highlight> it many times. I <highlight>have never tasted</highlight> anything so delicious! <highlight>Has</highlight> your family ever <highlight>lived</highlight> abroad?
content.question: Are we talking about specific times or general life experiences?
content.question_ru: Мы говорим о конкретных моментах или об общем жизненном опыте?

points.example: I have visited Paris. She has seen this movie.

points.rule: Use: Experiences in life (time not important)
points.rule_ru: Использование: Опыт в жизни (время не важно)
points.example: I have tried skydiving. (sometime in my life)
Have you ever been to London? I have never seen snow.

points.rule: How many times: once, twice, three times, many times
points.rule_ru: Сколько раз: once, twice, three times, many times
points.example: I have visited Rome twice. She has read this book three times.
I have seen it. He has seen it.

notice.instruction: Find all Present Perfect verbs. Identify the experience being described.
notice.instruction_ru: Найди все глаголы в Present Perfect. Определи, какой опыт описывается.

tasks.text: My grandmother has had an amazing life. She has lived in five different countries. She has learned four languages. She has met famous politicians. She has written two books about her experiences. She has never stopped learning new things. Has she ever regretted her choices? She says she hasn't. She has always followed her dreams. I have never met anyone so inspiring. Have you ever met someone who changed your life?

notice.reflection_question: Why don't we say 'I have visited Paris last year'?
notice.reflection_question_ru: Почему мы не говорим 'I have visited Paris last year'?

questions.explanation: Experience = have been (V3 of 'go' for places)
Have + V3 (seen is V3 of see)

sentences.correct: I have been to / have gone to London.
sentences.explanation: V3 of 'go' is 'gone' or use 'been' for places

produce.instruction: Write about your life experiences using Present Perfect.
produce.instruction_ru: Напиши о своём жизненном опыте, используя Present Perfect.
prompts: What unusual food have you tried?
What experiences have you never had but want to?
What is something you have done many times?
produce.example: I have had many interesting experiences in my life. I have visited five countries in Europe. I have been to France twice and Italy once. I have never been to Asia, but I want to go. I have tried many unusual foods. I have eaten snails in France - they were delicious! I have never tried sushi, but I want to. I have met many interesting people from different countries. Have you ever traveled alone? I have done it once and it was amazing!
criteria: Talks about life experiences without specific times

input_flood.description: Read 5 texts with Present Perfect for experience.

texts.title: Travel Bucket List
texts.content: I have always loved traveling. I have visited 20 countries so far. I have been to Europe many times. I have seen the Eiffel Tower and the Colosseum. I have never been to South America, but it's on my list. I have swum in three different oceans. I have hiked in the Alps. Have you ever traveled to a place that changed you? I have found that every trip has taught me something new.

texts.title: Food Adventures
texts.content: I have tried food from all over the world. I have eaten insects in Thailand - have you ever tried them? I have tasted the spiciest curry in India. I have never eaten raw fish, though. My brother has been more adventurous. He has tried snake and frog. We have both discovered that food is the best way to understand a culture. What unusual food have you eaten?

texts.title: Learning Languages
texts.content: I have studied three languages in my life. I have learned English and Spanish well. I have tried to learn Japanese, but I haven't mastered it yet. My sister has lived in France for two years and has become fluent. Have you ever felt frustrated learning a language? I have felt that many times! But I have never given up. Languages have opened many doors for me.

texts.title: Extreme Sports
texts.content: Have you ever done something really scary? I have tried several extreme sports. I have been skydiving twice. I have bungee jumped once. I have never felt such excitement! My friend has done even crazier things. She has climbed Mount Everest. She has swum with sharks. I haven't tried those yet. But I have learned that pushing your limits is important for personal growth.

texts.title: Job Interview
texts.content: Interviewer: Have you ever worked in a team? Candidate: Yes, I have worked in many teams. I have led projects with ten people. Interviewer: Have you ever dealt with a difficult client? Candidate: I have handled many challenging situations. I have never lost my patience with a client. Interviewer: What have you learned from your experiences? Candidate: I have discovered that communication is key. I have grown a lot professionally.
